troubleshooting.title: URL Chooser Does Not Shows a Prompt to the User That Asks for the URL

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: The UrlChooser feature in Web Author fails to display a prompt asking the user to input a URL.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: Some editing tasks require the user to link several resources. For example, when inserting an image, the user must provide the URL of that image. The same scenario applies for links between XML document and DITA conref attributes.

steps-informal.p: You can improve the user experience by implementing a custom URL chooser that allows for choosing a resource in your CMS. This can be achieved by extending the sync.api.UrlChooser class. The following code snippet implements a dummy UrlChooser that shows a prompt to the user that asks for the URL:
Then, you can register it using the following API call: workspace.setUrlChooser(new DummyUrlChooser());
